Hmmm... Makes me think twice if they make such a big deal of his 
stomach ache... Not the Saitou I KNOW... About the fudonshi, yes I 
remember the list talking about that around a month ago... Hilarious! 
I wonder where she got all her info though? I wonder how faithful 
Burai is to what is true about the real Saitou... Probably far huh? 

Well once I get paypal setup, I don't mind if they're just 
transalations. I love collecting manga (eventhough I can't read them).

Thanks for all the info Tiffany.

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "Tiffany" <secretarytocapt3@s...> wrote:
